metadata.title: Connect with MetaMask using the Checkout SDK
metadata.description: Learn how to connect a MetaMask wallet to your application using Immutable's Checkout SDK, with options for connecting with or without permissions.

metadata.title: Gas Estimation with Next.js
metadata.description: A Next.js application demonstrating how to use the Immutable Checkout SDK to estimate gas fees for swap and bridge to L2 transactions on Immutable zkEVM

metadata.title: Switch Network with MetaMask using Immutable SDK
metadata.description: An example app demonstrating how to switch between Sepolia Testnet and Immutable zkEVM Testnet networks using Immutable Checkout SDK and MetaMask

metadata.title: Wallet Balance with Next.js
metadata.description: A Next.js example app demonstrating how to use Immutable Checkout SDK to check wallet balances
